Text: I googled this, and it actually looks amazing! it completely overhauls HL2s graphics, replaces the blurry textures with HD ones, uses unreleased content, etc. for this one to work you have to have HL2 and bith episodes installed, if your missing one of them just google cinematic mod and get the right version

what does this package contain? The texture (mod itself) ONLY...or is there included the half Life 2 kit + ep 1 and 2, as well ? It's not clear. And WHY do I have to choose a ..."version" of that mod to..."suit" the half life 2 kit , as that comment said or is he mistaken ?

This package contains just the latest version of the mod itself, NOT HL2, HL2-Ep1/2.

What it actually contains is far more than just a texture mod, The game engine has been tweaked, models have been massively updated with much larger poly-counts and a lot more. The whole point of the mod was to turn HL2 into a far cinematic story with WOW quality graphics. 
The game pace has changed slightly due to this, but most people who have ever used this mod all consider a vast improvement over the original game.

The rason for finding the correct version of the mod is down to what parts of HL2 you have installed, as the mod requires certain objects and stuff from the GCF game files each version has to be tailored to the content available, otherwise you will get in game and all sorts could crash or just look stupid.

One note also is that if I remember right the mod combines all three story lines into one much larger game, you just play through, theres no loading HL2, then Ep1 then Ep2 it`s just one long game starting with Gordon waking up on the train into City 17 and finishing with the Strider battle from Ep2. Once Ep3 is complete I am sure there will be yet another version of this mod combining all 4 games.
